name: naomimoto
0:
”Alexa open mouse control”
”move mouse right”
”press tab key”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mouse control
des:
This helps perform simple tasks like 
moving mouse in a specified direction until the stop command is given 
it also helps to click by saying single click, duble click or right click
yo can also perform som quick tasks like close window, minimise window or maximize window 
and finaly it can help perform some specific key presses that aid in navigation like the tab key, up arrow and down arrow keys
An arduino MKR or any other arduino with HID capability and access to the internet is required to use this skill properly
